attributes.description: The CX-30 7th GENERATION is made to please!!! Features included: Engine power output: 121Kw / 213 Nm ( with I-stop ); LED headlamps with Auto levelling; Headlamps Auto on/off function; Front rain-sensing wipers; Airbags SRS: Driver, passenger, Knee (driver), side & curtain; Passive collision signal: hazard only; Head up Display (HUD); Cruise control; Leather-wrapped steering wheel; Leather-wrapped gear lever; Electronic Parking brake; MZS connect; 8.8 inch display; Commander dial; Apple Carplay and android Auto; USB connectivity; Bluetooth hands free system; 8 Speakers; Air-conditioning; Auto dimming rearview mirror; Auto door lock; One touch windows (Diver & passenger); Rear center console armrest with cup holders; 16 inch alloy wheels: grey metallic; Smart advanced keyless entry; Rear air vents; Parking sensors-rear; Auto paddle transmission switches. The vehicle has a 3 year / unlimited mileage Warranty 3 year / unlimited mileage Service Plan as well as Roadside Assistance. “Making the Impossible Possible”. All our new Mazda vehicles come with a 3 year / unlimited km Warranty and Service plan. All our approved used vehicles have been through a 160-point check and are of the highest quality. Please send us an online inquiry for the fastest response ..
